page.title: 18WHY PEOPLE LIKE ST.MARTINS.
page.content: We have interviewed some people who have lived here all their lives,also people who were born here but went away and have now come back.We spoke to some people who have been coming here on holiday for many years,and we have come to the conclusion that people like it because of the beauty and peace.It is so unlike the mainland.Some people like it here because it is a small community,where everybody knows and cares for each other. As children we like living on an island because we can go swimming nearly every day in the summer.Also we enjoy the freedom to wander safely, ride our bikes and go rock climbing. Even in summer the beaches are not crowded so we can enjoy barbecues and picnics.We like to play with children from the mainland when they are here.
